scripts.deploy:goerli: npm run prepare:goerli && graph deploy --product hosted-service nama-finance/namagoerli
scripts.deploy:mumbai: npm run prepare:mumbai && graph deploy --product hosted-service nama-finance/namamumbai
scripts.deploy:ar-goerli: npm run prepare:ar-goerli && graph deploy --product hosted-service nama-finance/arbitrum-goerli
scripts.deploy:polygon: npm run prepare:polygon && graph deploy --product hosted-service nama-finance/namapolygon
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --studio nama-protocol
